pullRequest.title: String improvements
pullRequest.bodyText:
What is it?

 Bug fix (user facing)
 Feature (user facing)
 Code base improvement (dev facing)
 Meta improvement to the project (dev facing)

Fixes the following issue(s)


Spelling

Not sure what "Change the download folders to take effect" means…

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -8,14 +8,14 @@
     <string name="install">Install</string>
     <string name="cancel">Cancel</string>
     <string name="fdroid_vlc_url" translatable="false">https://f-droid.org/repository/browse/?fdfilter=vlc&fdid=org.videolan.vlc</string>
-    <string name="open_in_browser">Open in browser</string>
+    <string name="open_in_browser">Open in web-browser</string>

nodes.bodyText: The old version looks good to me. Why do you want to change it?

nodes.bodyText: That's SoundCloud's original name / spelling. We should not change it.
